data.lines:
You can setup the display of the listings on your site pages listed below.
Choose one of 2 available ways of listings display: by 4 listings per a row (in the case we advise to set evenly even number for the value of the field "Number of listings per a page", so that every row had 4 listings) or by a list (listings will follow one another, every listing is in a new row).
Number of listings per a page
Most popular by number of views
Number of listings should be a counting number starting with 1 upto
Value of the field should be sa counting number no more than
